name: Keep Boosting!!
description:
• My game submission "Keep Boosting!!" for the "Keep Moving" themed GameJam on Itch io: "One Game a Month #16".

Controls

  • [A - MOVE LEFT]
  • [D - MOVE RIGHT]
  • [SPACEBAR - GAS]
  • [SHIFT- GEAR UP]
  • [CTRL - GEAR DOWN]
  • [ESCAPE - QUIT]
  • [H- HIDE TIP]

GameJam

  • Link to GameJam: https://itch.io/jam/one-game-a-month-16
